Tolkien-related events that took place in 1905.

content.title: Late 1904/Early 1905
content.content: ? - After the death of his mother, the guardianship of J.R.R. Tolkien and his brother Hilary is taken over by Father Francis Xavier Morgan, a priest of the Birmingham Oratory.

? - C.E. Stevens, Inkling, is born.
